intro: Are You Ready for This Tropical Adventure?
description:
You will play as Kaique, a brave Guarani warrior whose girlfriend, Kerana, is kidnapped by an evil god named Tau.

Collect materials to craft new items, grind through fast-paced battles, and test your strategy against challenging bosses.

Hunt, fish, swim, dive, jump, and explore the jungle!

In this fantasy game you wont find Dragons and Elves. But you will face Curupiras and Boitatas.


Features:
* It’s a classic turn-based RPG, but designed for a modern audience
* Interactive battle system (Quick-Time Events)
* Multiple map exploration abilities
* Playground Mode with no battles, just to enjoy the story
